LanguageData.VCE_CookGrillSimple.label: cook simple grill
LanguageData.VCE_CookGrillSimple.description: Cook two simple grills quickly cooked from a few meat ingredients.
LanguageData.VCE_CookGrillSimpleBulk.label: cook simple grill x4
LanguageData.VCE_CookGrillSimpleBulk.description: Cook 4 simple grills quickly cooked from a few meat ingredients.
LanguageData.VCE_CookGrillFine.label: cook fine grill
LanguageData.VCE_CookGrillFine.description: Cook a complex grill assembled with care from a wide selection of ingredients.
LanguageData.VCE_CookGrillFineBulk.label: cook fine grill x4
LanguageData.VCE_CookGrillFineBulk.description: Cook 4 complex grills assembled with care from a wide selection of ingredients.
LanguageData.VCE_CookGrillLavish.label: cook lavish grill
LanguageData.VCE_CookGrillLavish.description: Cook a masterpiece of the culinary arts, this grill nourishes the body, mind, and soul.
LanguageData.VCE_CookGrillLavishhBulk.label: cook lavish grill x4
LanguageData.VCE_CookGrillLavishhBulk.description: Cook 4 masterpieces of the culinary arts, these grills nourish the body, mind, and soul.
LanguageData.VCE_CookGrillGourmet.label: cook gourmet grill
LanguageData.VCE_CookGrillGourmet.description: Cook a culinary works of art, characterized by refined, even elaborate preparation and presentation of an aesthetically balanced, albeit low quantity grill.
